website_summaries.verdict: These boat fenders are quite the investment, but they're well made and backed by a lifetime guarantee, so it's worth it if you want a product that will last.
pros: Guaranteed against splitting or bursting for the life of your boat
Some customers have fenders that are 20 years old and still work
cons: A few reports of fenders losing air, but customer service is responsive

customer_reviews.title: Won't replace damaged bumper
customer_reviews.text: The bumpers that work are great. However one of the bumpers received had a hole in it and will not hold air. They refused to replace it because it was past their 30 day return policy. These were bought as a Christmas present and we obviously didn't blow them up till boating season. Disappointed that I have to buy a single bumper somewhere else now
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Great product - can inflate as needed
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because I thought they we the right size for my Monterey 194 FS bowrider. I keep this parallel to a dock in the summer, but should have purchased the next larger size. I ended up purchasing the larger Taylors (I kept these because I used them for 1 year). Very durable - I'll continue to purchase Taylor products. Like that I can inflate them as needed.
customer_reviews.author: D Robert

customer_reviews.title: Very nice fenders. However I'd go with the Polyform G4 if I didn't care about color or appearances.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice fenders. Also quite heavy. I decided to go with this 6.5x22 Taylor Made fender instead of the Polyform G4 fenders, mainly because I wanted Navy to match my Grady-White. The weight difference is quite noticeable. I'd actually buy the Polyform G4 fenders if I didn't care about the color. The G4s are much more affordable and work just as well.
customer_reviews.author: JR_TheFISH

customer_reviews.title: Taylor made is the best
customer_reviews.text: I have had taylor made bumpers all my life and you can't go wrong and I will never buy anything else. This all being said, this model will scuff easily. I'm just acquired a a 34 foot boat and its bigger than I have had in the past, a few bumps into the dock and the outer layer did scuff and will not come off.
customer_reviews.author: Jamjuve

customer_reviews.title: DEFECTIVE
customer_reviews.text: Two of the three that I ordered had a split in the seam. I ordered these but did not have a chance to use them until a few months later, then it was too late to return..These are top name brand items that should have some sort of warranty. UPDATE: Although it was too late to return to Amazon; it was fully warrentied from Taylor Made with no issues. Thay made full replacements after I sent the damaged ones back. Email them and they will make it right.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Good fenders
customer_reviews.text: Used two of these attached to our finger pier to protect the boat when docked. Much better than hanging fenders over the side.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Durability for sure!
customer_reviews.text: I've bought these for three boats and never had to replace any of them, just bought two more of the 8.5 ones and great. Can't decide on a color, buy the white ones and then later when you know the color buy covers that are washable. Great product, on the pricey side but you get what you pay for with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rizzman

customer_reviews.title: Ageless.
customer_reviews.text: Use water for recreation? You just can’t go wrong with the long lasting quality of Taylor products. That’s been my experience over the years with our 24’ vessel.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bell

customer_reviews.title: Product is great
customer_reviews.text: I only would like to mention that I placed specific instructions when delivering these 2 items and they were dropped off beside the road next to our mailbox. This could have caused a huge problem as someone could have easily driven by; stopped and picked up these boxes and taken off. The driver should have driven down the driveway and dropped these off at the "red house" at the end of the driveway as stated in the directions. Other than that, the items are great!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Puleo Seitz

customer_reviews.title: Only boat fenders that I'll own!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect.. soft vinyl that doesn't damage the boat finish.. I have used Taylor brand over any others based on the overall quality of their product and they last!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Tucker

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: They are Taylor Made . You get what you pay for so pay for the best , get the best .
customer_reviews.author: BOB

customer_reviews.title: Description is incorrect.  States 10.5x30 but these fenders are 8.5x26.
customer_reviews.text: I spent an hour chatting with two different customer service representatives, neither of whom could tell me whether this was a packing error or a description error. I was told to reorder and maybe I would get the right size. I finally just googled the item number and found out from other sites that the Amazon description is wrong. The item number listed is definitely for 8.5 fenders. The one star is for Amazon, not for Taylor Made. They make great fenders.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Split at seam in 6 weeks with light use
customer_reviews.text: I thought these were premium fenders, but mine developed two seams in calm bay in only a short time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: TaylorMade Boat Fender
customer_reviews.text: Taylormade Boat Fender-Sand colored 6 1/2" x 22" Very happy with purchase. Item shipped to me much quickier than expected. The price was Great. Amazon.com had this fender for $24.10 w/ Free Shipping. One month ago I had purchased these exact Fenders at a Boat Dealership for $30 plus tax. When we lost one from the boat I was so happy to find a replacement for less money :)
customer_reviews.author: Suzbeau

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: excellent product and a decent price. Its nice to have the color match the hull too!
customer_reviews.author: Brent L

customer_reviews.title: The big size work perfectly to protect your boat!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these, they do a great job protecting our boat!
customer_reviews.author: brenda l.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and value
customer_reviews.text: Perfect match to our other bumpers. Great quality and value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: LL404

customer_reviews.title: Great Fenders, bad website color image for White
customer_reviews.text: These are good quality fenders, but the color is confusing. This is actually a sand color - as the website points out, but the white (which I needed) is the burgendy fender. If you mouse over the burgendy fender, it will say White. The website needs to be changed to reflect the right image for color to aviod ordering the wrong color.
customer_reviews.author: Mike H

customer_reviews.title: super will buy again
customer_reviews.text: we had a little confusion about the actual product I wanted in the first place but I sent the fender back and they very quickly sent the correct model and color to me. very good quality and has a lifetime guarantee.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty Jones

customer_reviews.title: Beware of fakes
customer_reviews.text: Received a fake Taylormade fender from Amazon. Fender had no Taylormade stamp and had a very strong plastic smell.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie & Edan

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: I never even got to use it. I inflated them and stored them on the boat. When I went to use them I found one deflated. I inspected it and found a crack around the rope hole.
customer_reviews.author: Coleman Crutchfield

customer_reviews.title: Great Fenders.
customer_reviews.text: Greatest Fenders; heavy duty; priced right, full warranty. I have some of these that are twenty years old and still work. This is one item where price should be ignored and the only consideration is quality. These are the best.
customer_reviews.author: Tampa Sailor

customer_reviews.title: Nice little fender!
customer_reviews.text: Nice little fender and it nearly matches the color of my boat canvass! Seems to be made well and the measurements are perfect and fits nicely in my holder
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, guaranteed
customer_reviews.text: These fenders are guaranteed for life, under certain but generous conditions. Theft is not covered, so this one is a replacement for our vessel.
customer_reviews.author: rkr

customer_reviews.title: They are nice and big
customer_reviews.text: They are big for a 23 ft boat but my fault on the measuring. I will definitely not have to worry about my boat hitting another boat. They are nice and big!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Big Mac

customer_reviews.title: Super fenders
customer_reviews.text: These are great fenders. The black top minimizes the plasticizer buildup your get on white topped fenders after many years. The two rope holes allow you to use it horizontally if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Best Fender Out There. Period.
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome fenders. I am a commercial charter captain and have four of these and have never been disappointed with their performance. Best price anywhere is on Amazon. Great color holds up even in the salt and hot Fl sun.
customer_reviews.author: R. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Taylor Made stands behind their product
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, I prefer Taylor Made when I have a choice. I had some really old fenders that died a few years ago and they replaced them with no hassle, that's why I stick with them. Good customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Ozark Lady

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy product. The dark color does not get dirty ...
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy product. The dark color does not get dirty as fast as the lighter colors do.
customer_reviews.author: Susan B

customer_reviews.title: Fast prime shipping. great fenders.  half the price of West marine.
customer_reviews.text: Fast prime shipping. great fenders. half the price of West marine. Taylor made is the best of the fenders you can buy. I wish they included a needle or ball inflator but that's a minor 2 dollar cost at any sporting store.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey E.

customer_reviews.title: Unsatisfied!
customer_reviews.text: This product appears to be either a cheap imitation or a damaged product. I already own 3 of this item purchased at local marine store. This one just doesn’t have the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Orlando D.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love these - bought three, topped off the air pressure when they arrived and they have worked perfectly. A little larger than what came with my boat originally, but I like the additional protection so to me it's worth it. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy G

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Use refers today and I'm buying pair for back sides of our boat
customer_reviews.author: Tom C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price on a very good quality product. Mine needed a little air upon arrival.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew J. Geiger

customer_reviews.title: Nice product. Helps keep my gunnel from bouncing against ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Helps keep my gunnel from bouncing against the pier.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT SADLER

customer_reviews.title: Unusual poor quality for Taylor Made
customer_reviews.text: Item delivered with a cut around top, hole in side seam, just plain poor finish and quality. Have had many other Taylor Made fenders with no issues like the ones on this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They work perfect and inflate easily with a small ball pump
customer_reviews.text: They work perfect and inflate easily with a small ball pump. I have a navy boat and these match well. They are a good deal darker than the picture shown, which for me was a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: Lee H. Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money spent!
customer_reviews.text: Have purchased a total of 4 for my boat. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and is exactly what I was looking for. Good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Gwen J. Hoeck

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: matches what we already have and we like the taylor products
customer_reviews.author: cautious buyer

customer_reviews.title: OK.  But...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful fender. But unfortunately one was defect. Air was out after 5 minutes...
customer_reviews.author: Beat Gutekunst

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Matches the boat colors. These are the correct size for my pontoon boat and have been very durable. A good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Behrent

customer_reviews.title: Much bigger than I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: It's quite a bit bigger than I was expecting, but it provides a great cushion for the boat. We ordered two and one of them came partially deflated...need to find a bike pump and a needle to re-inflate it.
customer_reviews.author: Myke Olson

customer_reviews.title: Really nice, well made
customer_reviews.text: Really nice, well made. Have to make sure my fender line is really secure. Don't want to loose one of these!
customer_reviews.author: Todd157k

customer_reviews.title: Well made, sturdy, holds color. Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, work as indicated. Matches the boat well, and very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Kayak mom

customer_reviews.title: One won't hold air
customer_reviews.text: Received a 2 pack, one bumper has hole where the two colors meet, will not hold any air pressure. Other one is OK
customer_reviews.author: frank

customer_reviews.title: Great Fenders
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and are currently in use protecting my boat. They should last a long time. Even during storms, they hold the air and provide protection.
customer_reviews.author: CaptNemo

customer_reviews.title: Durable & Lasting
customer_reviews.text: Good product. We get years of use from these and we use them 2-3 times weekly.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Taylor Made Fender won't hold air
customer_reviews.text: We ordered four as Christmas gift. Got the boat out May 23 for the first time, and one of the four will not hold air. Policy states too late to return or exchange. I am stuck with a $72 flat fender...thanks Taylor Made.
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: Boat Fender
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace one lost by friends when they borrowed the boat...really love the product and it definitely gives our old pontoon a classy look.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Tough
customer_reviews.text: These fenders are much tougher than some other fenders I've had. The eyes are reinforced and the anti-roll ribs make sense.
customer_reviews.author: Alfa108

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistant fenders!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two boat fender the same size and color. One came as pictured and one was different slightly in size, and side ribbing to avoid rolling. Advised customer service who was very understanding and helpful by shipping another fender. Unfortunately it was like the one that wasn't as pictured. All three had different style imprints for the Taylor Made name, leaving me to believe they had been made in different factories? Returned all 3 and purchased from another source Polyfoam fenders, that arrived totally consistent to one another!
customer_reviews.author: Charles M. Horowitz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought two to use on my Robalo R245. One for the center cleat and one forward of it. They work perfect. I bought a smaller one for my rear (stern) cleat.
customer_reviews.author: Valenz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They look great and seem like a product that will last.
customer_reviews.author: Merkantyle

customer_reviews.title: boat fenders
customer_reviews.text: These fenders are the best purchase I ever made for my new pontoon.As usual amazon does a great job!! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: charles ciaccio

customer_reviews.title: Great products
customer_reviews.text: Even though Taylor fenders come with a lifetime warranty, they don't cover a situation where the owner literally rips one open on a sharp object! This was a replacement for one destroyed as explained above. I like the Taylor product because it's very sturdy and stands up to most abuse.
customer_reviews.author: bassn386

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 6 fenders, 2 were soft, and 2 were flat. They are supposed to be "inflatable". We even bought a bicycle needle to re-inflate the fenders. They inflated great but within hours deflated again. Normally Taylor Made products are very reliable but over the last 6 months every order I have gotten has had defective product in it.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Flawed valves
customer_reviews.text: Returned the first one because the valve leaked preventing the fender from maintaining pressure. Received the replacement and it has the same issue. Seems Taylor has a problem with the valves on some number of these units.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: The product came exactly as described. The quality is excellent and I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Eberhardt

customer_reviews.title: Great Boat Bumper
customer_reviews.text: Excellent boat bumpers...matchs my new black and blue Alumacraft boat.
customer_reviews.author: phil bakken

customer_reviews.title: fenders
customer_reviews.text: What can I say. They are boat fenders and perform as advertised. We will see how they last. Hope they don't fade.
customer_reviews.author: capt. bruce

customer_reviews.title: you need these!
customer_reviews.text: Can't fault these, bought 6 of them and they are nice in color, we've always had white ones.
customer_reviews.author: Thread shopper

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Fender
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fender. Durable and well built. Strongly recommend. It can withstand harsh elements. Color will not fade. Holds air very well.
customer_reviews.author: macgregor

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Shipped VERY quickly and were in use ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Shipped VERY quickly and were in use within days!
customer_reviews.author: Samuel H. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold air!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two of these. One will not hold air. I'm a little disappointed that I need to pump it up every week.
customer_reviews.author: Woosterlinks

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what we needed for our 36' offshore boat. Great price and I would highly recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Robillard

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Comes at a Price
customer_reviews.text: Taylor Made continues to impress me with thier superior quality with these fenders. A long term test for color fastness and durability can not be made at this time, but the initial quality is very high and I anticipate excellent service. Buyers should search around for pricing. Amazon often sells these for about half of a brick and morter marine supply. Buy bigger than you think you need! Great product and, through Amazon, a fair price!
customer_reviews.author: T. Loveday

customer_reviews.title: Boat fenders!
customer_reviews.text: We haven't used them yet, still kind of cold, but we are sure they will be perfect for our new boat!!! Can't wait!!
customer_reviews.author: Zayda Pou

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: These are well made and very sturdy. I really like that they come in a variety of sizes and colors.
customer_reviews.author: L. Meinert

customer_reviews.title: Taylor made in color.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. First purchased 12 years ago, lost one while boating perfect match to others , hope for many more years of enjoyment.
customer_reviews.author: J POOLE

customer_reviews.title: Didn't fit my holders
customer_reviews.text: These are slightly wider than they describe and letting air out of them is not a option for obvious reason. Had to return. Quality was very good though.
customer_reviews.author: Bentley R.

customer_reviews.title: product as described
customer_reviews.text: Large fender for 35 foot boat. Size important so that it fit the fender cariers on the boat and protects hull.
customer_reviews.author: gnj

customer_reviews.title: HIgh Quality
customer_reviews.text: These fenders are high quality and come with a lifetime guarantee. What more could you want. The are the perfect size for our 22 foot pontoon.
customer_reviews.author: Greg F

customer_reviews.title: Not as shown in the picture.
customer_reviews.text: Was looking forward to the 2 tone black fender with the charcoal color rub area. This is a single tone shiny black fender like any other that you could buy for less than half the price. Very disappointed, but I live in Canada so returns a would be a pain if not impossible. Look elsewhere!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

product_meta.title: Taylor Made Products Super Gard Inflatable Vinyl Boat Fender
feature_bullets: Made in the USA of the highest quality marine grade vinyl, recommended for boat size 25 to 30 feet
Feature a high gloss finish and double molded black ends for extra strength
Seamless one-piece construction with ribbed sides minimizes roll
Molded-in valve ensures easy inflation and long life
Rubber football needle valve for easy inflation and long life, ships inflated

Guaranteed for the life of your boat against splitting or bursting.There is room for some variation in size given that this is an inflatable product. The length measures from one hole to another hole.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
